document_data.name: Belasore chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Belasore chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Belasore chaka was based out of the coastal city of [[Klionna]] in [[Estagund]] on the [[Great Sea]].
document_data.Activity: Their wealth was generated through fishing and the sale of [[pearl]]s.
